mapper.select: SELECT e.id AS id, e.content AS content, e.create_time AS create_time, u.id AS user_id, u.user_name, u.user_avatar, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM evaluations ev WHERE ev.parent_id = e.id) AS childTotal, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM evaluations_upvote eu WHERE eu.user_id = #{userId} AND eu.evaluations_id = e.id) AS upvoteFlag, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM evaluations_upvote eu WHERE eu.evaluations_id = e.id) AS upvoteCount, #{userId} AS user_id_param FROM evaluations e LEFT JOIN user u ON u.id = e.commenter_id WHERE e.content_id = #{contentId} AND e.content_type = #{contentType} AND e.parent_id IS NULL ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT e.id AS id, e.content AS content, e.create_time AS createTime, e.parent_id AS parentId, u.id AS userId, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM evaluations_upvote eu WHERE eu.user_id = #{userId} AND eu.evaluations_id = e.id) AS upvoteFlag, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM evaluations_upvote eu WHERE eu.evaluations_id = e.id) AS upvoteCount, u.user_name AS userName, u.user_avatar AS userAvatar, u1.id AS replierId, u1.user_name AS replierName, u1.user_avatar AS replierAvatar FROM evaluations e LEFT JOIN user u ON u.id = e.commenter_id LEFT JOIN user u1 ON u1.id = e.replier_id WHERE e.parent_id = #{id} AND e.parent_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id DESC

AND e.content_type like concat('%',#{contentType},'%')
AND e.content like concat('%',#{content},'%')
AND e.create_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}

SELECT e.id, e.user_id AS userId, u.user_name AS userName, u.user_avatar AS userAvatar, 'comment' AS type, e.content AS content, e.content_id AS contentId, e.content_type AS contentType, COALESCE(g.title, cn.title) AS contentTitle, COALESCE(g.cover, cn.cover) AS contentCover, e.create_time AS createTime, FALSE AS isRead FROM evaluations e LEFT JOIN user u ON e.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN gourmet g ON e.content_id = g.id AND e.content_type = 'gourmet' LEFT JOIN content_net cn ON e.content_id = cn.id AND e.content_type = 'content_net' WHERE e.commenter_id != #{userId} AND ( EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM gourmet g2 WHERE g2.id = e.content_id AND g2.user_id = #{userId} AND e.content_type = 'gourmet' ) OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM content_net cn2 WHERE cn2.id = e.content_id AND cn2.user_id = #{userId} AND e.content_type = 'content_net' ) ) ORDER BY e.create_time DESC
LIMIT #{offset}, #{size}
